title: Journey of Hope
description: HEATHER BARLOW HAS always been idealistic, and now that she has finished high school, she’s ready to make a difference in the world. After graduation she joins a mission group on a hospital mercy ship sailing to Africa.Praise for Angel of Mercy :“There’s a huge audience for McDaniel’s romance fiction, and this one has all the features her readers look for.”— Booklist“Most readers will be caught up in the passion and sorrow of Heather’s missionary experiences.”— School Library JournalPraise for Angel of Hope :“The love between the sisters is realistically portrayed, and Amber’s slow maturation is convincing.”— Booklist
author: Lurlene McDaniel
